author: taylor
msg: Added check to disable already selected portlets.

author: taylor
msg: Added new methods to get, set and clear variables from the session.

author: morciuch
msg: Added JSP equivalents for templates used in print and info portlet actions. These actions wouldn't work if JSP is set as a default template engine.

author: morciuch
msg: Implemented automatic password expiration feature (see Bugzilla bug# 11736).

This feature is disabled by default. To activate set services.JetspeedSecurity.password.expiration.period in js.props to a value greater than 0 - number of days between expirations. If activated for the first time, all users will have their passwords automatically expired (unless TURBINE_USER.PASSWORD_CHANGED is set).

author: ggolden
msg: The DatabasePsmlManagerService now takes an optional parameter:
which can name a torque pool to use for all database access in the service.
If not specified, the default pool is used.
The JetspeedGroup/Role/UserProfilePeer classes were updated to take
DBConnection parameters - the service gets the connection from the proper
pool and gives it to the peers to use.
